title: Future developers
text: developer, want build similar dashboard, want understand used technologies taking project. can install development version DataTriangulationStream2 GitHub :

title: Future developers
text: First, parts dashboard built using R R shiny hosted shinyapps.io servers, app URL used integrate 3 platforms using iframe. ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples.

title: Future developers
text: data sources used project : DHIS2 National instance: aggregated data collected via web-api ’s updated monthly SORMAS (NCDC) case based data row case. sources available csv files alternative denominator

title: Future developers
text: remote database cloud based SQL database aimed store combined data Dhis2 SORMAS provide high scalability reliability dashboard even one data sources . remote database Aurora MySQL database AWS (developed using AWS console) updated Anto-update database cloud server.

previous_headings: Process of the Dashboard development > 2. Remote database
title: Future developers
text: cloud server,automatically pulls data Dhis2 combines SORMAS data alternative denominator data updates remote Database done month. server AWS, Kubernetes (eks) uses docker containerized image automatically pull data Dhis2 updates remote Database. Kubernetes Cronjobs used achieve automation. image stored Aws ecr (Elastic Container Registry). Build Kubernetes cluster terraform used keep track infrastructure code. Connecting Kubernetes cluster done via aws cli kubectl. R scripts images described R code scripts section.

what: 3. Shinyapps.io servers were used to host the dashboard.
title: Future developers
text: Based dashboard architecture, deploying dashboard RStudio hosting services .e., shinyapps.io best choice use 70% (Note number can change depending server configurations) users won’t need pull data remote database directly, example access dashboard time frame like 5 minutes (Note number can change depending server configurations) remaining 30% users pull data directly database therefore improving speed performance.

title: Future developers
text: Since dashboard web-based technology, gives us ability integrate already existing systems .e Dhis2, SORMAS, MSDAT via iframe since also web-based technologies. iframe HTML tag .e (piece code) like <iframe> URL </iframe> Dhis2 App Using Dhis2 Application development platform, custom Dhis2 app developed hold iframe. zipped folder compiled containing custom App, later uploaded Dhis2 instance via App Management App Dhis2.

code: @Manual{,   title = {DataTriangulationStream2: Nigeria RI/VPDs Data Triangulation Dashboard},   author = {AFENET GEEKS},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://github.com/afenetgeeks/DataTriangulationStream2}, }

title: Nigeria RI/VPDs Data Triangulation Dashboard
text: goal data triangulation project conduct Data triangulation exercise turn Nigeria Routine Immunization Vaccine Preventable Diseases Surveillance datasets interactive dashboards.

title: Nigeria RI/VPDs Data Triangulation Dashboard
text: Nigeria Routine Immunization (RI) & Vaccine Preventable Diseases Surveillance (VPDs) Data Triangulation Dashboard visualizes selected indicators across RI & VPDs programme. dashboard integrated country’s DHIS2 national instance (FMoH), Surveillance Outbreak Response Management Analysis System (SORMAS) (NCDC), Multi-Source Data Analytics Triangulation (MSDAT) (FMoH) Platform. updates dashboard still controlled AFENET geeks team. servers database powering dashboard independent three platforms hence case reason can still access dashboard alternative system contact AFENET team. dashboard provides access timely information (data updated monthly basis) required decision making national sub-national levels.

title: Nigeria RI/VPDs Data Triangulation Dashboard
text: Use filters top dashboard say, can select Disease, State, LGA, year, month suits needs press UPDATE.  Note: maps separate filters panels

title: Nigeria RI/VPDs Data Triangulation Dashboard
text: boundaries names shown designations used map imply expression opinion whatsoever part AFENET GEEKs concerning legal status country, territory, city area authorities, concerning delimitation frontiers boundaries. Dotted dashed lines maps represent approximate border lines may yet full agreement.

title: Run the Shiny Application — run_app
text: Run Shiny Application

title: Run the Shiny Application — run_app
code: run_app(onStart = NULL, options = list(), enableBookmarking = NULL, ...)

title: Run the Shiny Application — run_app
text: onStart function called app actually run. needed shinyAppObj, since shinyAppDir case, global.R file can used purpose. options Named options passed runApp call (can following: "port", "launch.browser", "host", "quiet", "display.mode" "test.mode"). can also specify width height parameters provide hint embedding environment ideal height/width app. enableBookmarking Can one "url", "server", "disable". default value, NULL, respect setting previous calls  enableBookmarking(). See enableBookmarking() information bookmarking app. ... arguments pass golem_opts. See ?golem::get_golem_options details.
